===Etymology===

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=go|れんじょう|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|kyu=連聲|れんじょう|hhira=れんじやう}}

# {{lb|ja|linguistics|sort=れんじょう}} a morphological change of an initial syllable of the second [[kanji]] under the influence of the historical [[coda]] of the first kanji in a word, such as [[天皇]], whose pronunciation is not ''ten’ō'' but ''ten'''n'''ō''.
